desc: The two-volume set LNCS 10704 and 10705 constitutes the thoroughly refereed proceedings of the 24th International Conference on Multimedia Modeling, MMM 2018, held in Bangkok, Thailand, in February 2018.

details.authors: Klaus Schoeffmann (Editor),‎ Thanarat H. Chalidabhongse (Editor),‎ Chong Wah Ngo (Editor),‎ Supavadee Aramvith (Editor),‎ Noel E. O'Connor (Editor),‎ Yo-Sung Ho (Editor),‎ Moncef Gabbouj (Editor),‎ Ahmed Elgammal (Editor)

title: MultiMedia Modeling
